issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: For TIMOB10490, the app is supposed to display a video on screen. This is supposed to be triggered by pressing a button which says Preview Movie. Clicking on the button just triggers a blank screen and there is no way to exit, you have to kill the app. This issue occurs on Android device (6.0.1).
fields.summary: TIMOB-10490 on Media Module doesn't display video in Android
